message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its immense value and quality, it's worth noting that this item holds a significant importance to me. However, I understand the unique perspective you bring to its worth, as you see it valued at $12,000. Considering this, I would like to extend an offer to you at a price of $11,000. This offer is designed to be mutually beneficial, allowing you to secure an item of such high value while also ensuring a fair return for my investment. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can come to an agreement that satisfies both our interests.
